text: Giuseppe Civran (1629 – 17 May 1679) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Vicenza (1660–1679). (in Latin) ==Biography== Giuseppe Civran was born in Venice, Italy in 1629. On 21 June 1660, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Innocent XI as Bishop of Vicenza. He served as Bishop of Vicenza until his death on 17 May 1679. ==References== ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Innocent XI Category:1629 births Category:1679 deaths
title: Giuseppe Civran
